text: Twins Glacier is west of the Continental Divide in the northern Wind River Range in the U.S. state of Wyoming. The glacier is located in the Bridger Wilderness of Bridger-Teton National Forest, and is among the largest grouping of glaciers in the American Rocky Mountains. The glacier is situated in a northeast facing cirque, below the summit of Winifred Peak. ==References== ==See also== * List of glaciers in the United States Category:Glaciers of Sublette County, Wyoming Category:Glaciers of Wyoming
title: Twins Glacier
